# names Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "names" {
  definition = "(region)-(stage)-(name)-(random)"
  variables = [
    {
      name    = "region"
      default = "we"
    },
    {
      name       = "stage"
      max_length = 4
      default    = "dev"
    },
    {
      name       = "random"
      generated  = true
      max_length = 8
    },
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `definition` (String)
- `variables` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--variables))

<a id="nestedatt--variables"></a>
### Nested Schema for `variables`

Required:

- `default` (String)
- `generated` (Boolean)
- `max_length` (Number)
- `name` (String)
